1.title: Where to start?

choices: Lauren's graduation party
Lauren to get a summer job
Lauren to take a trip with her friends
Lauren to go on a vacation with her family
11.content:
The sun came through the windows, awakening Lauren from her slumber. It was a Friday morning, but the first time in a while, Lauren didn't have to get up and go to school.

The commencement celebration was the previous night. Lauren, now 18 years old, had graduated from high school. After all the trials and tribulations of the past year, she was thrilled to have made it through high school. She had the summer to herself, before heading off to college in the fall.

As everyone knows, time flies and soon it was time for...
11.title: High School Graduation/ First Summer, Finding h...

choices: A Lifeguard at the local swim club
Counselor at a Day Camp
Assistant at the Animal Hospital
112.content:
After Lauren's graduation, she realized she needed to find a job for the summer so she could have some spending money. She just didn't know where to start looking.

One morning, Lauren opened the local paper and as she was flipping through the classifieds she saw a job opening for....
112.title: Lauren to get a summer job

choices: That the head doctor of the hospital hates Dogs
That a man waiting is beating his dog
A dog tied up outside, all alone
1123.content:
Lauren sees an ad for being a assistant at the local animal hospital. She thinks that this would be good for her, considering her interest in the job and her new powers. She calls the number and sets up an interveiw.

When Lauren arrives at the hospital, she is shocked to find...
1123.title: Assistant at the Animal Hospital

choices: Amber Thompson, the receptionist
Casey Williams, another assistant at the hospital
11233.content:
Lauren is shocked. There, just outside the animal hospital, was a beautiful golden retriever tied to a post. The dog appeared to be whining. Lauren went over and petted the dog. She also poured some water out of a bottle she had and the dog quickly lapped it up.

"Who would do something like this?" Lauren asked.

"My owner works inside," stated the dog. "She doesn't like to leave me alone at home, she thinks I'll make a mess."

"Well, I'll just have to teach her a lesson." Lauren said as she walked into the animal hospital.

When Lauren enters, she finds out that the dog's owner is....
11233.title: A dog tied up outside, all alone

choices: A customer brings a cat into the animal hospital
Amber goes to the kennel to retrieve a pet for a customer
112331.content:
As Lauren enters, she walks up to the receptionist.

"May I help you?" Amber asks.

"Yes, I'm Lauren Tampert, I'm here for an interview." Lauren responds.

"One moment please." Amber says as she calls the head vet on call. "OK" says Amber as she hangs up the phone.

"He'll be with you in a moment, please take a seat" Amber replies.

"Thank You" Lauren replies. "By the way do you know who's dog that is outside?" she asks.

"That's goldie, she mine." Amber said. "My parents got her for me to keep me company, but I don't want her running around the house unsupervised when I'm at work."

"Well, how would you like to be tied up all day!" Lauren said curtly.

Amber just gave Lauren a look as she took a seat waiting for the vet to come and interview her.

Soon enough, the vet comes out and takes Lauren in for her interview. While Lauren is interviewing...
112331.title: Amber Thompson, the receptionist

choices: tells Amber to take a break
returns to the interview
1123311.content:
Everything seemed to be going well with the interview until Dr. Jackson heard a commotion coming from the waiting room.

"Excuse me, Lauren, I need to see what's going on out there I'll be back in a minute." he said.

In the lobby, Dr. Jackson finds Amber leaning out of her window snarling at Mrs. Martin and her terrified grey cat.

He says, "What seems to be the matter here?"

"Caaaaatrrrrrrrrrrrrr!" growls Amber.

"Well, I never. I'm taking my business elsewhere. You know your receptionist bit me!"

"Sorrrrrrry, but you put your hand between my mouth and that catrrrr!"

Mrs. Martin holds tight to her cat which is squirming to be free, as she leaves the office.

As Mrs. Martin leaves Dr. Jackson....
1123311.title: A customer brings a cat into the animal hospital

choices: Amber wakes up
Someone enters the examination room
11233111.content:
Amber agrees as she certainly wasn't acting like herself. She would never act that way in front of a customer.

Dr. Jackson suggested that Amber lie down for a while. The was an examination room that was empty, so Amber laid down on the chair in there and Dr. Jackson dimmed the lights.
11233111.title: tells Amber to take a break

choices: Amber goes to check on Goldie
Amber goes to get a drink
11233112.content:
Dr. Jackson looks at Amber

"What the hell are you doing? I'm very disappointed in you Amber. I'm giving you a warning. I should fire you after this incident."

Dr. Jackson goes to return to the interview as Amber finally realizes what had happened. Amber then started to feel hot, and without even thinking about it, began to pant.
11233112.title: returns to the interview

choices: The door opens
Amber is stuck outside
112331121.content:
Amber decides she could use some fresh air and realized it would be a good time to check up on Goldie.

She walked out the side door and bent down to untie Goldie's leash, when she felt the joints in her hands buckle up.

“What’s wrong with my hands?” She asked herself as her fingers flexed wildly on her own.

She could see her hands beginning to grow smaller, the fingers shortening and growing closer to each other. Amber’s eyes grew larger as they followed her thumb halfway up her forearm where it lost its center joint, rendering it useless. She stood up beginning to panic as she recognized her own hands as two dog paws.

“How…Who did this happen!” She said beginning to breathe heavily.

The tops of her paws grew extremely itchy as a thin coat of her own blonde hair sprout on them. Amber ran toward the door. Though as she tried to grip the handle, the fact that she had no thumbs began to sink in. Tears began to form in her eyes as she banged her paws against the door, her claws scratching the white paint.
112331121.title: Amber goes to check on Goldie

choices: Amber looks over at Goldie
Amber runs off to find someone to help her
1123311212.content:
As hard as Amber tried, she wasn't able to get the door open.

As Amber continued to fiddle with the door, her attention was pulled to her feet as she felt them buckle just as her hands did. She felt pressurized pain caused by her foot stretching and lower leg shrinking simultaneously. Amber found herself now leaning against the door just to stand up as the pain in her feet stopped, her heel now halfway up her shin, giving the illusion of her having a backwards knee. She watched helplessly as her toes shortened and blonde fur grew on her feet and up her new legs.

“What’s going on? Why is this happening?” She cried.

Her spine make a loud crack as it slowly bent forward. Amber leaned harder against the door, but her spine overwhelmed her and sent her falling on all fours. Amber tried desperately to rise, but between her new spine configuration and unbalanced feet, she fell time and again. Now trapped on all fours, Amber surveyed her body and realized that her limbs had been reconfigured into a canine structure. She didn’t want to believe it, but she knew that she was turning into a dog.

Amber stiffened as she felt something pushing out the bottom of her spinal chord. She kept her eyes forward as her tears fell to ground below her, for she did not wish to watch her own body change. She heard a loud rip as the growing lump tore through her jean shot-shorts and extended. Her elongated spinal chord then fell between her legs, pivoting back and forth. She didn’t have to look back to know that she had grown a tail.

“No… I don’t want to be an animal! I’m a human!”

She sobbed feeling the fur flood her body up to her neckline in a continuous streak of itchiness and discomfort. The fur then met with the patch traveling up her arms to cover her body from the neck down. Amber could feel her bones and organs shifting and shrinking.

She noticed that her attractive curvy feminine figure was growing smaller and filling out to a parallel state. Amber could tell that under her shorts and tank-top, dwelled the body of a dog and not the young woman that it once was.

“Please… oh God make it stop! I can’t be a dog! I have my whole life ahead of me! This can’t happen to me!” She screamed between her uncontrollable sobs.

The fur started on her neck, thickening it wider as it grew. Amber shook her head desperately trying to stop the transformation. The final patch of fur then sprouted on her face neatly blending in with her human hair. She could partly see that her nose was turning black and flattening on her face as her ears grew into points and moved to the top of her head.

She tried to scream again, but her jaw clamped shut tightly. Amber could feel her teeth growing into points as her whole face began to stretch forward. Within seconds she could plainly see the top of her nose on the end of the log furry bridge that was her new canine muzzle. Her jaw loosened as the feeling on the transformation left her body. It was over. As Amber looked back at her body, she realized she had been completely transformed into a yellow dog. The tears fell from her eyes like a faucet now, as her mind was clouded with questions that all lead to her living the rest of her life as a common mutt.
1123311212.title: Amber is stuck outside

choices: She starts to talk to Amber
She starts to turn into a human
11233112121.title: Amber looks over at Goldie

choices: Amber starts to feel strange
Amber starts to hear voices
1123312.content:
As Lauren and Dr. Jackson conducted their interview, another customer entered the hospital. Mrs. Smith had left her dog there while she was away on vacation for the past week.

Since it was slow and no one else was around, Amber agreed to go to the back to get Mrs. Smith's dog.

As Amber entered the kennel....
1123312.title: Amber goes to the kennel to retrieve a pet for ...

choices: An assistant come in to see what all the noise is
Amber tries to get out of the office
11233121.content:
As Amber enters the kennel, a tingling sensation touches her ears. She lifts a hand and touches her ears, the right, then the left, feeling that they had become more pointed, with a light coating of fuzz now covering them.

" What's Happening?" She exclaimed. " How can…?"

Soon fur starts poking through her skin along the sides of her face and neck, a brushing feeling. A slight sting enters her eyes, very briefly, as the fur starts to cover her face. A black smudge touches her nose. She wondered where the smudge could have come from. No, Amber thought frantically, her nose was turning black! Cracks and jolts rocked her face as her mouth pushed outward into a dog’s muzzle, quickly becoming covered in soft golden fur. Her teeth sharpened, into fangs, as her tongue lengthened further and further out with her muzzle. The human hair she had began to fall out, falling gradually to the floor, to be replaced by the same fur that was invading the rest of her head.

" No, stop. Nogghhh." A lump formed in Amber’s throat. Her vocal chords were changing. " Ngghhh, Grrrrfff."

Amber shook her head, and with a huge effort, tried once more to speak.

"Grrrrfff… Grrrr" Was the best she could manage.

Amber moved a, hand?, up. They weren’t hands, Amber thought desperately. Not anymore. Her hands, paws, were changing, her fingers were shorter and her thumbs were now a long way up her wrist, with short black claws protruding out. Leathery pads had developed on her palms.

"My-help me!" She tried to call out, but could only make a high-pitched whine.

Amber slashed her right paw down her shirt, ripping the buttons apart, tearing the garment off her body. She was horrified to find thick golden fur covering almost all of her chest along with two rows of 6 new nipples a piece running down her torso.

Pressure built up at the base of her spine, an uncomfortable pulling sensation. No, not that, she thought urgently, not a tail! She fell to the floor, crawling hysterically out of her jeans as the pressure of her changing hips and legs became too much to bear, using her newly formed forepaws to drag herself along. She watched, panting, as her new tail grew at an astonishing rate, snaking out until it lay on her backside. God, she could feel the thing sitting there.

Embarrassment flushed her mind as the fur grew across her hips. Bone cracked across her legs as they became thinner, differently jointed, suited to the rest of her body. Her feet cricked and Amber was pushed up on to her toes, on to all fours like the animal she knew she was becoming. Leathery pads invaded the bottom of her altering feet, while fur grew on the few patches of skin that still remained bare. Amber tried to stand, strained to get up, but clumsily fell back on to her four legs.

A plethora of new smells started to invade her canine nose. The sounds became crisper, clearer, the birds around the office now seeming much closer than they ever had before.

Then the changes stopped. Amber looked over her golden-furred body, at her tail, her four paws, at her black nose, which was always in her vision. A golden retriever. That was what she was. Not human anymore, not physically at least.

"Let me out! Let me out of this, please! I don’t want to be an animal!" she tried to scream.

" Grrrr ahoooo." She howled, vainly attempting to call out for help.
11233121.title: Amber starts to feel strange

choices: Lauren
Herself? (Actually Goldie)
112331211.content:
"Well, how did you get out, buddy? Let me just help you get back in here, We wouldn't want you to run away!"

The assistant leads Amber to one of the larger cages, and though Amber tries to resist, the assistant is able to put her in the cage.

"Help! I'm Amber! I'm not a dog, I'm a human!" Amber tries to say

"BARK BARK GRRR BARK!" is how it comes out.

"Shhhhh" says the assistant "Be a good dog and keep quiet."

The Assistant leaves, and Amber just sits there wimpering. Suddenly, the door opens again. Who is it?
112331211.title: An assistant come in to see what all the noise is

choices: The Dogs in the cages
Lauren

12.content:
Lauren was in her last year of college. With everything that had happened over the past few years, college hadn't been that easy for Lauren, but she was almost done.

After graduating high school, Lauren was accepted into Mystic College. It was far enough away from home that she would live on campus, but close enough she could return home on the weekends to see the family.

After a long four years and a lot of hard work, Lauren was taking her final veterinary medicine classes and was looking forward toward her graduation.

One day.....
12.title: College Senior, meeting Burt

choices: Lauren finds a  Poodle locked in a cage in the basement of the house
Lauren finds a drunk kid mistreating a Beagle
Lauren finds a Great Dane locked in a Car
124.content:
One of Lauren's friends on campus, Tessa Dalgo, was having a huge party at her place. Lauren liked to hang out with he friends, but she also knew these parties were perfect fodder for dog hating activity.

What happens at the party?
124.title: Lauren attends a party on campus

choices: Lauren and Burt look to buy a house
Lauren tries to get a job at the local vet
Lauren looks to open her own vet hospital
13.content:
After college, Lauren and Burt decided to get married. It was a beautiful ceremony and they have a lovely honeymoon in the Hawaiian island. A few weeks later, Lauren found out she was pregnant.

Lauren and Burt were thrilled, but realized that they had a lot of issues to address before their child was born. They wanted to be secure in their jobs and have a house ready for their child.

After taking some much needed rest and relaxation after college and the wedding....
13.title: Out of College, starting profession and Pregnant

choices: Lauren see her High School friend Katie on the lawn next door
Lauren hears a dog in distress
Lauren sees the man next door hurting his dog
131.content:
Lauren and Burt look in the papers, and see an add for a reasonably priced house in the suburbs. The house looks very nice, and it is the perfect size for the family she plans to have. They decide to go to the open house, which is only a couple of days away.

After Lauren and Burt both look for jobs through the week, it is finally the day of the open house. As Lauren and Burt walk to the house...
131.title: Lauren and Burt look to buy a house

choices: Lauren goes to her office
Lauren has the day off from work
Lauren takes the kids to school
14.content:
Lauren has become a very successful veterinarian. In fact she is viewed as the premier vet in the state. Aside from her job, Lauren has had a busy personal life.

She has given birth to two daughters, Candice, who is a sophomore in high school, and Rachel an 8th grader at Winslow Elementary. Candice is an excellent basketball player, and Lauren hopes she will get a college scholarship between her athletic abilities and her intelligence. Rachel is still unsure of what she wants to do. Rachel isn't as athletic as Candice, but she is just as smart. At times she really enjoys helping her mom around the office, but other times, she seems like she wants to do her own thing.

As the sun rises on another day.....
14.title: Mid-Life, raising her daughters and doing her job

choices: Lauren moniters previous curses
Lauren transforms  the Man into a Great Dane
Lauren Transforms the Greyhound into a woman
142.content:
Lauren had one of her few days off today, meaning that it was the day that she would have to go out and curse others. Lauren has a bunch of curses to monitor, she has two she has been meaning to get to, and she never knows what she will encounter on the streets. She decides to go for the two she has been meaning to get to.

There is a man who just moved in a couple blocks down who has been arguing with his next door neighbor about her Great Dane. His arguements are unjustified, but Lauren wanted to give him a few days to change. He has not, so she has no choice.

Further down into the suburbs, A Greyhound is wondering what is so great about being human. Lauren likes the dog, and so she wants to give it a chance at seeing life on two feet.

However, Lauren realizes that there are mant other cases she needs to monitor.
142.title: Lauren has the day off from work

choices: A Police officer into a German Shepherd
High School Track Star into Greyhound
Firefighter into a Dalmatian
1421.content: Which of the following curses does she check up on
1421.title: Lauren moniters previous curses

choices: James gets ready for work
James gets ready for a date with his girlfriend
James takes his kids to the park
1422.content:
Lauren goes for a walk towards the man's house. Deep down she had hoped he would change, but as she approached, she soon realized he hadn't. She could heard him yelling about the dogs barking.

Lauren walked to the front door and knocked. James Anderson, a business man in his thirties, opened the door.

He asked, "How may I help you?"

Lauren was in no mood for pleasantries.

"How can you show such hate towards an innocent animal. You and your family are now cursed, for you show no love for animals. From now on, Once everyday each member of your family will transform in dogs at a random time in the day, until you learn how to break the curse..."

James didn't want to hear anymore, he slammed the door in Lauren's face. Lauren didn't seem to mind, she knew people found the curse hard to believe, but soon this man and his family would get a new appreciation of the canine life...
1422.title: Lauren transforms  the Man into a Great Dane

choices: He hears the Dog Barking again
He takes a shower
14222.content:
James gets ready for his day off from work, and a day long date with his new girlfirend, Mary Vascow. James divorced from his first wife, Tammy, about two years ago. He and Tammy keep a relationship for the sake of their two kids, Ben, who is 8 and Wendy, who is 4. James is very much in love with Mary, and has even thought of proposing to her.

As James gets ready...
14222.title: James gets ready for a date with his girlfriend

choices: James starts drinking from the toilet
James goes to shave
142222.content:
James takes a quick shower and cleans up real well. After the shower, however, is when the trouble begins. Instead of reaching for a towel, James simply shakes himself dry. James doesn't realize what he did until a couple seconds after the action was completed.

"What just happened?" He said to himself.
142222.title: He takes a shower

choices: Yes
No
1422221.content: He looked down at the toilet and thought that it looked fresh and clean. He bent down and started drinking from it. Does he notice how strange he's acting?
1422221.title: James starts drinking from the toilet

choices: James' hand cramps as he shaves
The hair he just shaved instantly grows back
1422222.content:
James knows that Mary hates a man who is not clean shaven, so he makes sure to shave before he heads out for the day. When he gets to the mirror, he notices that he has more hair on his face then ussual.

"Where did all this hair come from?"

James shakes off his inquiry and begins to shave.
1422222.title: James goes to shave

choices: James gets a good look at himself in the mirror
James drives over to Mary's
14222222.content:
James starts to shave his face, but as soon as he finishes one side. The hair grows back immediately.

"What's going on?" James asked himself.

No matter how many times he shaved the hair continued to grow back. James looked at his watch and realized he was supposed to meet Mary in 15 minutes.

"I don't have time for this, I have to go." he said as he washed his face.
14222222.title: The hair he just shaved instantly grows back

choices: James licks Mary's face
James poops on Mary's front lawn
142222222.content: On the way there, James has this urgent and sudden urge to stick his head out the window, He doesn't know why, really, but the urge is too great. He rolls down his window, and sitcks his head out. He hangs his tounge out, and he feels exhilarted. Soon enough, he is at Mary's house.
142222222.title: James drives over to Mary's

choices: James eats Mary's lunch like a dog, much to Mary's anger
James grows a tail while Mary is washing her face.
1422222221.content:
James quickly rushed out of his car and to Mary's door. He knocks three times, and Mary opens the door, with an almost annoyed smile.

"Oh, hi James."

Suddenly, James, with no explination, starts to lick Mary's face. Mary pushes James away in disgust, and starts to wipe her face.

"EWWW! James, what the hell are you doing to me?"

James looks back in confusion "I...I don't know. I just felt so excited to see you and the next thing I knew, I was licking your face."

Now with an angry look on her face, Mary says "Just come inside. Let me wash my face before lunch."
1422222221.title: James licks Mary's face

choices: James gets a call from Tammy
James notices Wendy chasing a cat
14223.content:
It is Jame's day with the kids, as he divorced his wife Tammy two years ago. He decides to take , Ben, who is 8 and Wendy, who is 4 to the park first, then out to lunch. He picks up the kids from Tammy's house. He notices some changes to his Wife, but dismisses them, not wanting to cause a fight.

James and his kids arrive at the park. James lets his kids play while he does some work. He opens his labtop and begins to crunch numbers. He is so busy, he doesn't notice that a fine layer of hair has started to grow on his arms and legs.

the alarm clock sounds. Lauren and Burt both wake up to start their day. They both shower and get dressed. Lauren goes to check on her two daughters to make sure they are awake, then she goes downstairs to make breakfast. The family enjoys a nice meal together before Burt has to leave for work. Candice and Rachel come down the stairs and all three of them head out to the car. They all get in and Lauren starts to drive them to school.

"What?"

What is Lauren's response?

"OK I'll do it." Lauren said. "But remember, I have no control over when the change will take place."

"I know, I know" said Katie. "We've been over this enough times" she said.

Reluctantly Lauren said, "You are now cursed. From now on, Once everyday you will transform into a dog at a random time in the day, until you learn how to break the curse."

"Thanks, Lauren" Katie said.

"I hope you know, what you are getting yourself into." Lauren replied as she hung up the phone.

A Wax and Tanning Session
14311111111.content:
Katie got together what she needed and was soon on her way to the Renew Day Spa. She pulled in and checked in with the receptionist.

"May I help you?" she asked.

"Yes, I'd like your one day all inclusive package" Katie said.

"Very well. Have a seat and someone will be with you in a moment."

"Thank You" Katie said.

Soon enough Katie's name was called and she was taken to the back for her first treatment...
14311111111.title: Go to a day spa

choices: Katie waits in the chair for Katherine to return
Katie dries herself off
143111111111.content:
Katie's first stop was for a shampoo and new hair style.

Katie sat down in the chair and tilted her head back allowing, Katherine, the stylist to start washing her hair.

An Katherine started to wash Katie's hair, Katie noticed her wrinkle up her nose.

"Is everything OK?" Katie asked.

"Uuuummm... Katie," the assistant asked nervously, "when did you last shampoo your hair?"

"Why?" Katie asked curiously.

"Well, your hair kind of smells..." the assistant "well, weird."

As Katherine walked over to help another client, Katie got a good wiff of the odor. The smell was strangely familiar to Katie. Her eyes went wide as she realized what it was. Katie smelled the distinct odor of wet dog hair.

“God, I smell like a dog.”
143111111111.title: A Shampoo and Hair Cut

choices: PBS
Animal Planet
1431111112.content:
Katie sat around for a while unsure of what to do with her free time. It had been a while since she had a day to herself. After thinking about it for a while, Katie decided to just sit back on the couch and watch some TV.

She grabbed the remote and turned on...
1431111112.title: Katie relaxes around the house

choices: Katie falls asleep on the couch
Katie goes to get something to eat
14311111121.content:
Public Television. Apparently her son was watching the TV before he left. Katie was about to turn the channel when they started talking about colors. A bunch of circles flashed across the screen but Katie quickly realized that she couldn't tell red from green and soon all of the colors looked the same. Everything turned black and white.

"It's started" Katie said to herself

"I've got a dog's vision" she said as she happily thought about what was still to come.
14311111121.title: PBS

choices: Katie hears a noise outside
There is a knock at the front door
14311111122.content:
Katie turned on the TV and noticed that there was a dog show on. She laughed a bit, always enjoying watching the canines in these things. She was practically staring at the TV, completely engrossed in the show, leaning closer and closer to the TV, a spot of saliva sliding down her lips as she licked them. She kept staring, not usually this into these kind of shows, but she jumped a bit, feeling something cold land on her leg, and she glanced down, letting out a nervous giggle.

"Haha.. I must of really been bored to be so into this show.." She said softly, realizing that she was drooling a bit.

She wiped her mouth, and kept watching the show closely. Before long, she didn't even notice it, but her tongue started poking out past her lips, the tongue a bit larger then usual, and a couple slightly visible dark spots on it. But then she realized something, that she never barked before in her life. That’s when she remembers Lauren cursing her. She stated on the phone that she has no idea when the changes were taking place and it could happen at random events. So it was obvious that she got aroused when she saw dogs making out on Animal Planet and the constant barking when she saw that cat attacking her flower bed. So she shrugged her shoulders and said to herself, “Wow… Guess Lauren was right about the curse. I have to be careful on what I’m going to do or people will notice something suspicious about me.”

After she said that, she felt a strange feeling coming from her body but couldn’t quite put her finger on it. She then felt prickles on her skin and she was itching for a bit. She guessed that it was beginning process of her fur. It wasn’t visible yet, but it will be a matter of time before it covered her body completely.

During her scratching, she noticed something else on her hands. There was some fat growing on her thin and slender fingers. She could also see her nails loosing its red nail polish color and ends were looking a little sharper. Again, another change the Katie has to deal with, as she knew it would be a matter of time before she loose her hands completely.

Just then, her ears felt a little pain and were almost feel like they were moving around. Wondering if its another one of those changes, Katie approached the mirror and checked his face. So nothing has changed but her ears looked a little different. The top tips of her ears looked a little pointed and they appear to be moving by a crawl.

Once the changes started, it immediately stopped and nothing else was different about her. She was lucky that the changes were minimal. Lauren couldn't believe it. Miss Morgan seemed like such a nice woman.

Lauren pulled her car into a parking space and went into the school. She found Miss Morgan putting together her lesson plan for the day.

"Miss Morgan" Lauren said as she entered.

"Mrs. Cadinsin" Miss Morgan responded. "How can I help you? Are you here to talk about Rachel's grades?"

"Not exactly" Lauren said. "I was just curious, is that your dog locked up in the car out there?"

"No, it's my sister's, I'm just watching her while they are out of town." Miss Morgan responded.

"And you keep her, locked up that car all day?" Lauren questioned.

"Well I let her out at lunch."

Lauren was appalled. How could Miss Morgan do this. Clearly she needed to be taught a lesson.

Just then the bell rung. "I'm sorry Mrs. Cadinsin but I have to get ready for class."

As Miss Morgan started to make notes on the board, Lauren said "You are now cursed, for you show no love for animals. From now on, Once everyday you will transform into a dog at a random time in the day, until you learn how to break the curse."

Unfortunately Miss Morgan wasn't paying any attention as she continued to write notes on the board. Lauren made her way out of the classroom waiting to see what would happen.

As Rachel read from the text, Miss Morgan finally took one hand and snaked it down into her pants and felt around in the area of her discomfort. There was something hairy in there and it had a hard core to it. “What the hell got into my pants?” She asked herself.

1433122221.content:
She didn't believe it. How had Lucy gotten out of the car?

"Miss Longfield, may I please be excused for a moment? I just remembered... I left my homework in my car."

"Hurry it up, please."

Stephanie quickly ran out of the classroom and slipped out the side door. She was surprised to see...nothing. Lucy wasn't there. But she was sure she had seen her.

She headed toward her car. Strangely enough, the door to the backseat was open, and Lucy was standing in front of it.
1433122221.title: Steph notices her dog sitting there

choices: It Starts to Get Weird
Lucy Barks
Something Else
14331222211.content:
"Back in the car, Lucy," Stephanie said in a firm voice

Lucy shook her head.

"Come on, Lucy. I'm supposed to be in class. Be a good girl," Stephanie tried to gently urge her into the car when she felt a pain in her back and hunched over.

"What the hell?" She muttered. The pain returned whenever she tried to stand up straight. She leaned against the side of the car.
14331222211.title: Stephanie Tries to Get Lucy Back into the Car

choices: Lucy Stands Up on Two Legs
Stephanie tells Lucy to go for help
Something Else
143312222111.content:
"Are you all right?" An unfamiliar female voice asked. "Do you need me to get help?"

She whirled around, forgetting about her back, saw no one there but Lucy, and fell to the ground in a rather undignified way. "What? Who said that?"

"Wait...you understand me?" Lucy said, surprised herself.

"Of course, I understand you. But how are you talking?"

"You just haven't been listening," Lucy said. "Like when I told you I hated being stuck in the car all day."

"Well, I can't exactly take you to class, can I?" Stephanie said. "Wait a minute, I'm talking to my dog...I've never taken drugs..."

She tried to get to her feet, but was having trouble.

"Well, how would you like being stuck in there all day?" Lucy said.
143312222111.title: It Starts to Get Weird

choices: Lucy offers her a hand
Stephanie tries to reach for her phone
Something Else
1433122221111.content:
"Well, I don't like being stuck in school all day. We all have things we don't like," Stephanie said, irritably, still trying to get up.

Lucy stood up on her hind legs, and slowly straightened into a stable position. Her neck cracked a bit as it shifted into a more stable position on top of her torso. "Are you sure you don't want any help?"

"Positive. I just need to..." she trailed off as she got from the ground to all fours with an audible crack, but discovered trouble getting beyond that.

She looked up at Lucy, her own head shifting and rolling around her shoulders and realized she might actually need some help.
1433122221111.title: Lucy Stands Up on Two Legs

choices: Stephanie finds herself following the command
Stephanie gets annoyed
Something Else
14331222211111.content:
"Come on, don't be stubborn," Lucy said. "Give me your paw," she said, holding out her own.

"I don't have a paw," Stephanie said. "Wait a minute, when did you get so tall?"

"If you are going to be stubborn about this..." she started to mimic Stephanie herself. "Come on, Steph...give me the paw..."
14331222211111.title: Lucy offers her a hand

choices: "I think we have a problem"
Something Else
143312222111111.content:
Almost automatically, Stephanie held out her left hand before she could even think about it.

"Good girl..." Lucy said.

"What do you mean, good girl?"

"You're always saying it when I do what you want," Lucy said.

"Could we continue this conversation later? After you help me up?" Stephanie said.

"Oh....sorry," Lucy said, looking away from Stephanie's face down to her paws. "How, exactly?"

"You offered me a hand...I thought you were going to pull me up."

Lucy grasped Stephanie's paw in her hand. "Ummm...Steph...."
143312222111111.title: Stephanie finds herself following the command

choices: Stephanie isn't screaming for some reason
Stephanie panics
Something Else
1433122221111111.content:
"Umm...Steph...I think we have a problem," Lucy said.

"What?" Stephanie said, sounding irritable still.

"I said...give me your paw...you gave me a paw..." Lucy said, slowly.

"So?"

"You have paws," Lucy pointed out. "That's umm...new."

Stephanie looked down. "What the...." She looked down at her hands, which were back to touching the ground...except they weren't hands. They were paws. Furry paws.

She looked back up at Lucy. Hands. Long, artistic ones. They didn't look like Stephanie's, but they didn't look like ones that belonged on a dog....even one who seemed to have developed upright locomotion.
1433122221111111.title: "I think we have a problem"

choices: Stephanie agrees
Stephanie tries to leave again
Something Else
14331222211111112.content:
Stephanie began to panic. "This isn't happening," she said, backing away from Lucy. She decided to make a break for it. She got about two paces.

"Steph, stop..." Lucy called.

Stephanie suddenly felt a sharp tug holding her back. She whirled around, stopping in her tracks. Her eyes wandered to the leash that she saw led from out of her line of sight, the end of which was in Lucy's hand.

Lucy's eyes widened, and she dropped it like a hot potato. "It...was just suddenly...there," she said.

"How are you doing this?"

"Me? You aren't doing this?" Lucy asked her. "I mean, you're the master, right?"
14331222211111112.title: Stephanie panics

choices: Steph is obedient
Lucy is annoyed
Something Else
143312222111111122.content:
"Yes, and you are the dog. I don't know what is going on, I'm getting out of here before anything else happens to me," Stephanie insisted.

She turned, and tried again. She got ten paces away this time. Suddenly, she heard Lucy's voice ring out. "Steph...come..." in a firm and authoritative voice.

Lucy's voice rattled around in her brain, and she immediately, without thinking, turned around and returned to her side. "Sit," Lucy said. And Steph planted herself down.

She looked up at Lucy again.
143312222111111122.title: Stephanie tries to leave again

choices: Lucy gets it
Steph panics in a unexpected way
Something Else
1433122221111111221.content:
Lucy looked even taller than before. She stood up straight, confidently looking down at Stephanie. "Good girl. Now...no more running away, okay?"

Stephanie nodded. She felt the urge to listen to Lucy, as she seemed to have control of the situation, where Stephanie didn't.

"Now, we need to figure out what is going on," Lucy said. "I feel like...the answer is close...I just can't see it."

Stephanie's world suddenly went grey.
1433122221111111221.title: Steph is obedient

choices: Lucy is getting smarter
Steph is losing knowledge
Something Else
14331222211111112211.content:
Lucy's world suddenly erupted into an avalanche of color. "Whoa," she said, looking around.

"What is it?" Stephanie said. "What is happening now?" She asked, putting her paws on Lucy's leg.

Lucy looked at herself and at her companion. "No way...."

"What!" Stephanie whined, a bit more urgently.

"Don't you get it...you're becoming more like me, and I'm becoming more like you."

"That's ridiculous," Stephanie said.

"Why can't you see it?" Lucy pondered. "Wait a minute...if I'm becoming more like you..."
14331222211111112211.title: Lucy gets it

choices: Lucy begins to shed
Steph doesn't want to be seen like this
Something Else
143312222111111122111.content:
"Why can't you see it?" Lucy pondered. "Wait a minute...if I'm becoming more like you...Steph...down."

Stephanie automatically got off Lucy's leg.

"Roll over..." Lucy said.

Stephanie did.

"Now beg."

Stephanie started to get into position before she froze. She couldn't help herself. It was just automatic.

"You're pretty good at tricks. Better than me even."
143312222111111122111.title: Lucy is getting smarter

choices: Lucy can still understand her
Lucy can't understand her
Something Else
1433122221111111221111.content:
Lucy began to scratch absent-mindedly at her side. It was feeling a bit itchy. She didn't notice that the hair around her torso was starting to fall off, she was trying to calm Stephanie down.

"Look," Lucy said. "It's not so bad. I mean...I know it's new, but what's so bad about being more like me?"

Steph opened her mouth, and nothing came out. She couldn't figure out what to say. As her jaw hung open, her perfect white teeth began to sharpen and grow thicker, as the muscles around her jaw thickened with them.

A thin patch of brown fur appeared under her jaw, and Stephanie barked.
1433122221111111221111.title: Lucy begins to shed

choices: Lucy Starts to Look More Human
Steph develops a sudden urge
Something Else
14331222211111112211111.content:
"You don't have to use that kind of language, Steph," Lucy said.

Stephanie's tongue hung around the side of her still growing jaw, which was starting to stretch away from her face. How was she going to go back to class like this?

"If this continues," Lucy said, "everyone will think you're a dog," she said.
14331222211111112211111.title: Lucy can still understand her

choices: Stephanie tries to fight one last time
Lucy has a strange feeling
Something Else
143312222111111122111111.content:
Lucy didn't notice that she had been growing a long dark mane of hair out of her skull. It was nearly down to her shoulders, which had lost their fur, revealing tanned skin...which seemed to be spreading at a faster pace.

At the same time, the patch of fur under Stephanie's jaw was growing around her face like a strange beard, and her nose was getting moist.
143312222111111122111111.title: Lucy Starts to Look More Human

choices: Stephanie's teacher calls on her
Stephanie asks to be excused
1433122222.content:
As her teacher starts the lecture, Stephanie notices a squirrel on the ground outside the classroom. This was a usual occurrence and normally she wouldn't pay much attention to it, but for someone reason Stephanie couldn't keep her eyes off of the squirrel.

A part of her wanted wanted to go out there and chase the squirrel. Stephanie never had these feeling before and didn't know what was going on.
1433122222.title: Steph notices a Squirell

choices: Steph gives in and goes outside
Steph resists the urges and runs into the bathroom
14331222222.content:
Wanting more time to think about her decision, Stephanie quickly raises her hand.

"Miss Longfeild, may I go to the bathroom?"

"Hurry it up, please."

Stacy quickly runs out of the classroom and into the hall.
14331222222.title: Stephanie asks to be excused

choices: She gets a drink of water
She heads back to her bio class
143312222221.content: Steph steps out into the hallways and quickly tries to locate the squirrel. Her eyes locate her target and she gives into her urge to chase it. She ran after it with a burst of speed, barking at the poor animal as it tried to escape. She eventually haunched onto all fours and ran around campus after the squirrel. She continued chasing it until it ran up into a tree. She barked at it until she realized what she was doing. Why did she chase that squirrel? Did she just run on all fours? What caused her to do that? Whatever happened, she knew she was thirsty.
143312222221.title: Steph gives in and goes outside

info.brief_description: Follow Lauren Tampert after she gains the incredible ability to transform others into Dogs
info.description:
Lauren Tampert lives one crazy life. At the beginning of her Senior Year of High School, her mother caused her entire family to be cursed. The curse was that each member of the family would transform into a dog at random points during the day, and Lauren's form was a German Shepherd. Little did Lauren know that the fact that she became German Shepherd would change her life forever. She was the chosen one, the next curser. The Old Man began to train Lauren in the art of cursing people, and explained to her the rules of her new "Profession" The Curse was soon broken, and the old man passed away, leaving Lauren to do her new job all alone. Follow Lauren from her High School Graduation to her Old Age, following every turn along the way.

RULES FOR LAUREN:
-Lauren becomes a Vet. She is considered the best in the area.
-Lauren can transform into a German Shepherd at will.
-Lauren can Transform both individuals and groups of people.
-Lauren can also transform Dogs into Humans.
-Lauren can Understand Dogs
-Dogs can sense Lauren's power
-Lauren will ocasionally display dog insticts. As she grows older, she better learns to control them

IMPORTANT PEOPLE
Margret Tampert- Lauren's Mother, a Bussiness Woman. Lauren sometimes comes to her for advice. She has had issues with Julie Tampert about how she is portrayed in Julie's book
Julie Tampert- Lauren's Older Sister. She wrote a "Fiction" Book about the original Curse and became a famous author. She and her mother have fought about the portrayal of her mother as a villanous jerk.
Jack Tampert- Lauren's Dad. He owns a small coffee shop until he retires
Zach Tampert- Lauren's Little Brother. He becomes the drummer of a small time band called "Grand Insanity" Which eventually gets radio time with their single "Club of Idiots"
Kate Whipson- Lauren's best friend since 5th grade, her neighbor, and her co-worker. she is the only one outside of Lauren's immidiant familty to know about Lauren's Powers.
Burt Cadinsin- Lauren's Husband. Lauren meets him in her senior year of college adn eventually marries him. He has no clue about Lauren's power.
Candice Cadinsin- Lauren's first daughter. She dreams of being a basketball star, and is really indifferent to animals.
Rachel Cadinsin- Lauren's second daughter. She is torn between following her mom's footsteps or going off on her own path.

Be sure to check out the original story. http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1345496
info.pretty_title: The Life and Times of Lauren Tampert
